  • {list} – y values

  • {str} (format) – plot title

  • {str} – target directory

  • {str} – image file name

  • {bool} (display) – display plot (default: False)

  • {str} – image format (default: png, others: svg)

GaussParse.docs.plot_result module

class GaussParse.docs.plot_result.PlotResult(src, sheet_name)[source]

Bases: object

Plot results

excelLoader(excel_file)[source]

load an excel file containing data as: column 1: ID column 2: X - coordinate reaction point column 3: Y - energy data column 4: GROUP - indicate data series column 5: LEGEND - legend for each data series column 6: COLOR - data series color column 7: LABEL_POSITION - label position column 8: LABEL_DISPLAY - display data column 9: Y_POSITION - label position column 10: Y_DISPLAY - display data

args: excel_file {str}: excel file directory

return: data for plotting

init_plot(manual_options={}, save_img=True)[source]

Plot energy profile

mPlot(data, save_img)[source]

plot data series

Parameters:

  • data – list of dict

  • {bool} (save_img) – set to save plot (default: True)

  • options (other) – X {list}: X values Y {list}: Y values LABEL {list}: labels LEGEND {list}: legend GROUP {list}: group id COLOR {list}: data series color LABEL_POSITION {list}: set label position on each line (default: top) LABEL_DISPLAY {list}: set label display (Yes/No) Y_POSITION {list}: set label position on each line (default: top) Y_DISPLAY {list}: set label display (Yes/No) plot_type {str}: plot type, linear or gaussian save_img {bool}: set to save plot (default: False) img_name {str}: plot name (file name) target_dir {str}: plot img to target dir plot_sub {dict}: subplot details row {number}: plot row col {number}: plot column y_label {str}: y label text x_label {str}: x label text plot_title {str}: plot title xlim {list[number]}: x-axis range ylim {list[number]}: y-axis range figsize {list[number]}: fig size (default: [10,6]) y_major_locator {number}: set y-axis major locator

options = {'fig_size': [12, 6], 'img_name': 'plot', 'label_margin': 4, 'plot_sub': {}, 'plot_title': '', 'plot_type': 'linear', 'target_dir': '', 'x_label': 'Reaction coordinate', 'xlim': [10, 10], 'y_label': 'Gibbs free energy (kcal/mol)', 'y_major_locator': 5, 'ylim': [5, 5]}

generate_xyz_file(atom_list, file_name='molecule')[source]

Generates an XYZ file from a list of atom positions with nicely formatted columns.

args: atom_list {list of tuples}: Each tuple contains an element symbol and its x, y, z coordinates. file_name {str}: The name of the output XYZ file.

return: file name

Example input for methane (CH4): atom_list = [

(“C”, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000), (“H”, 0.000000, 0.000000, 1.089000), (“H”, 1.026719, 0.000000, -0.363000), (“H”, -0.513360, -0.889165, -0.363000), (“H”, -0.513360, 0.889165, -0.363000)

]

save_data_to_txt(d, file_name, df_format='string')[source]

save xyz coordination output.log to txt file such as Notepad
